display_long_description:
Tophat Tag is a Gorilla Tag fangame created by the Gorilla Tag content creator win_GT.

Jump in and have fun with your friends across a variety of unique game modes and worlds! Put your movement skills to the test or just hang out and explore — the choice is yours.

✨ Features include:
	•	Cosmetics – Customize your look and stand out from the crowd.
	•	Zero Gravity – Float, flip, and play around in an anti-gravity arena.
	•	Parkour Challenges – Attempt to beat tricky obstacle courses that test your climbing and jumping skills.
	•	Lore Hunting – Become your own Game Theorist and uncover hidden secrets throughout the maps.
	•	Glass Bridge – Test your luck and strategy in this high-risk challenge.
	•	Hangout Spaces – Relax with friends, socialize, and explore together.

This tophat-shaped world is yours to explore — jump in, tag your friends, and see where the adventure takes you! 🕶️🎩
